title: Payment calculator
description: Sunny West-Facing One-Bedroom Condominium at The Grand Chelsea  APARTMENT This inviting one-bedroom home at The Grand Chelsea offers an ideal combination of light, space, and function. With a west-facing exposure , the apartment is sun-flooded throughout the day and features a spacious comfortable layout. The well-proportioned living room is enhanced by a functional pass-through kitchen, designed for both everyday convenience and entertaining. The bath has been renovated with new fixtures and beautiful tiling that brings a modern touch, while ample closets throughout the apartment ensure excellent storage. The large bedroom comfortably accommodates a king-size bed and additional furnishings, creating a true retreat within the city. A thoughtfully designed layout maximizes both flow and usability. BUILDING  &  NEIGHBORHOOD Nestled in the vibrant heart of New York’s Chelsea neighborhood at the corner of 17th Street and Eighth Avenue, The Grand Chelsea Condominium offers an unparalleled living experience. This full-service building boasts 157 units across 21 stories, each exuding contemporary elegance and urban sophistication. Convenience is key, with iconic landmarks such as the High Line and Meatpacking District just a stone's throw away. Indulge your palate at renowned eateries like Cookshop, Shukette, and Jack's Wife Freda, or explore the latest trends in the neighborhood's diverse array of shops. Commuting is a breeze, thanks to easy access to multiple subway lines including A, C, L, 1, 2, 3, as well as bus routes, ensuring you're always well-connected to the city's pulse. Embrace the cultural scene with Chelsea Market and art galleries lining 10th Avenue, promising endless opportunities for exploration and discovery. For that buyer who wants to live in the heart of New York’s Chelsea neighborhood please look no further. There is an additional monthly assessment of $296.91.
